method_binding.note: All 11 methods extracted from D2_Q2_Executor in executors.py

question_context.question_text: ¿La descripción de las actividades de género detalla el instrumento ('mediante talleres', 'a través de capital semilla'), la población objetivo ('mujeres rurales', 'madres cabeza de familia') y la lógica causal ('para generar autonomía', 'porque reduce la dependencia')?

patterns.pattern: mediante|a través de|con la implementación de|por medio de
talleres de|capacitaciones en|jornadas de|mesas de trabajo
mujeres rurales|madres cabeza de familia|mujeres víctimas de VBG
mujeres cuidadoras|mujeres en extrema pobreza|mujeres LBT
con el fin de|para lograr que|lo cual genera|porque permite
para fortalecer la autonomía económica|para reducir la dependencia
para prevenir la VBG|para promover la participación política

validation.description: Resultado de validaciones lógicas de la respuesta (coherencia, integridad, etc.).

trace.description: Información de trazabilidad (provenance, logs) específica de la ejecución.

metadata.description: Metadatos adicionales de la pregunta para consumo posterior.

### Resumen Ejecutivo

**Área de política**: Derechos de las mujeres e igualdad de género

**Dimensión**: ACTIVIDADES

**Puntaje**: {score}/3.0 | **Calidad**: {quality_level}

method_combination_logic.combination_strategy: Bayesian-causal fusion across 11 epistemologically heterogeneous methods. Causal structures are identified, then Bayesian posterior updating quantifies mechanism probabilities and intervention effects. Integration sequence: (1) Financial data extraction and quantitative baseline establishment; (2) Bayesian probabilistic analysis (5 methods) generates posterior distributions over hypotheses; (3) Cross-validation between methods identifies convergent and divergent evidence; (4) Bayesian-causal synthesis: posterior distributions over causal mechanisms inform final estimates with uncertainty quantification. Data transformations: Bayesian outputs (posterior distributions) → probability mass functions over hypotheses; Financial outputs (numerical assessments) → calibrated quantitative scores; Causal outputs (graphs, mechanisms) → validated causal pathway structures. This particularized strategy respects the intrinsic epistemological nature of each method class and ensures authentic intersection of heterogeneous evidence types into a coherent, structured answer for Q007 in PA01/DIM02.
method_combination_logic.rationale: D2-Q2 (Q007) for PA01/DIM02 requires consistent extraction, validation, and synthesis across 11 methods. This block documents how the pipeline combines method outputs into a single evidence product.
method_combination_logic.evidence_fusion: Evidence from all methods is aggregated by the EvidenceNexus according to evidence_assembly. Overlaps are deduplicated where possible and confidence is propagated conservatively.
method_combination_logic.confidence_aggregation: Confidence is aggregated via contract-defined merge strategies, favoring calibrated methods when available.
trade_offs: Coverage vs. cost: using 11 methods increases coverage but raises computation and maintenance burden.
Recall vs. precision: multiple detectors increase recall but can introduce redundancy; deduplication and weighting mitigate this.
Sophistication vs. interpretability: advanced models can be less transparent; human_readable_output documents assumptions and limitations.

rules.description: Auto-generated: require all required expected_elements types
Auto-generated: encourage optional evidence types when available

traceability.provenance_note: This contract was generated with full multi-method orchestration support. The method_binding.methods array contains all 11 methods from D2_Q2_Executor, and human_answer_structure documents the expected evidence output after execution.

fallback_strategy.note: No fallback strategies enabled. All failures propagate according to error_handling configuration.

calibration.note: Contract does not embed calibration scores. Actual calibration managed via src/farfan_core/core/calibration/ + config/intrinsic_calibration.json + config/fusion_specification.json

human_answer_structure.description: Expected structure of evidence dict after all 11 methods execute and evidence is assembled according to assembly_rules

assembly_flow.step_1_method_execution: 11 methods execute in priority order, outputs stored with dot-notation keys
assembly_flow.step_2_evidence_assembly: EvidenceNexus merges outputs according to assembly_rules
assembly_flow.step_4_output_generation: Phase2QuestionResult constructed with evidence, validation, trace

evidence_structure_schema.description: Assembled evidence after all methods complete

elements_found.description: Concatenated evidence elements from multiple methods (assembly_rules target)
